Footer.aboutFounder: My name is Rodrigo, I've just turned 18 years old and I love listening to stories since I was little.

EmailSignup.title: Get Notified When We Launch!
EmailSignup.subtitle: Be the first to know when Mythoria becomes available and start creating your magical stories.

messages.success: Thank you for your interest! We'll notify you as soon as Mythoria is available.

EmailSignup.privacy: We respect your privacy. No spam, just launch notifications.

completion.title: Your Story is Ready!
completion.description: Congratulations! Your magical story has been created and is ready to be read.

celebration.title: Your story is now part of the Mythoria collection!
celebration.description: Share it with friends or create another magical adventure.

progress.title: üè≠ Story Factory in Action!
progress.description: Your story will be ready in up to 14 minutes

tip.title: Pro tip!
tip.description: While you wait, you can visit "My Stories" to track progress in real-time or start creating another story!

generate_outline: üç´ Our Oompa-Loompas are sketching your story blueprint on chocolate paper!
üìã The writing elves are mapping out your adventure with enchanted quills!
‚ú® Story architects are designing the perfect plot structure!
write_chapters: üìñ Oompa-Loompas are furiously typing on their tiny typewriters!
‚úçÔ∏è Our literary elves are weaving your tale with golden threads!
üé≠ Story scribes are bringing your characters to life with magic ink!
üìö Chapter wizards are crafting each page with literary spells!
generate_front_cover: üé® Our artistic Oompa-Loompas are mixing magical paint for your cover!
üñåÔ∏è Master illustrators are sketching your cover with rainbow brushes!
üåü Cover designers are sprinkling stardust on your book's face!
generate_back_cover: üé≠ Back-cover poets are writing mysterious blurbs with invisible ink!
üìñ Our synopsis scribes are crafting the perfect teaser!
‚ú® Cover completion elves are adding the final magical touches!
generate_images: üñºÔ∏è Illustration Oompa-Loompas are painting each scene with emotion!
üé® Picture wizards are bringing your characters to colorful life!
üåà Art fairies are adding magical details to every illustration!
üñåÔ∏è Visual storytellers are creating windows into your world!
assemble: üìö Book binding Oompa-Loompas are stitching everything together!
üîß Assembly elves are making sure every page is perfect!
üìã Quality control wizards are checking every magical detail!
generate_audiobook: üé§ Voice acting Oompa-Loompas are narrating your story!
üéµ Audio wizards are adding the perfect storytelling rhythm!
üéß Sound engineers are polishing every magical word!
done: üéâ Ta-da! Your magical story is ready for its grand adventure!
‚ú® All done! The Oompa-Loompas are taking a well-deserved cocoa break!
üèÜ Mission accomplished! Your story is complete and ready to enchant!
default: ‚ö° Our magical Oompa-Loompas are working their creative wonders!

NotFound.title: 404 - Page Lost in the Enchanted Forest
NotFound.mainHeading: Oops! This Page is Lost in the Storybook
NotFound.description: It seems the page you're looking for has wandered off into an unwritten chapter! Maybe it's hiding in a fairy tale, or perhaps it got caught up in an adventure of its own.
NotFound.funnyMessage: Our literary elves are searching through every book in the magical library, but this page seems to have gone on its own quest!

suggestions.title: While we search for your lost page, you could:
items: üìñ Return to the Homepage and start a new adventure
üéØ Check if the URL is spelled correctly (even magic has rules!)

NotFound.quote: "Not all those who wander are lost... but this page definitely is!" - A confused Hobbit

descriptions.alloy: A neutral and balanced voice suited for general narration and information delivery.
descriptions.ash: A clear and precise voice, ideal for instructions and technical explanations.
descriptions.ballad: A melodic and smooth voice that lends itself well to storytelling and narrative content.
descriptions.coral: A warm and friendly voice, perfect for conversational interfaces and customer-facing dialogue.
descriptions.echo: A resonant and deep voice, offering a strong presence for announcements and formal messages.
descriptions.fable: A warm and engaging voice with a storytelling quality, designed for immersive narratives.
descriptions.nova: A bright and energetic voice, great for upbeat content and enthusiastic deliveries.
descriptions.onyx: A deep and authoritative voice that conveys gravitas and trustworthiness.
descriptions.sage: A calm and thoughtful voice, well-suited for reflective content and guidance.
descriptions.shimmer: A bright and energetic voice, adding sparkle and dynamism to your audio.
descriptions.verse: A versatile and expressive voice that adapts well to a wide range of tonal requirements.
